tool_description: Analyzes soil contamination potential and existing contamination levels from mining operations and processing activities.

heavy_metals.description: Heavy metals of concern (lead, mercury, cadmium, arsenic, etc.)

metal_concentrations.description: Measured concentrations in mg/kg (must match heavy_metals length)

soil_ph.description: Soil pH values for each sample

land_use.description: Intended land use (agricultural, residential, industrial, recreational)

depth_sampled.description: Sampling depths in meters for each sample

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All sample-related arrays must have the same length as soil_samples.
Invalid pH values: Soil pH must be between 0-14.
Invalid concentrations: Metal concentrations must be non-negative.
Invalid sampling depth: Sampling depths must be positive.
Invalid land use: Use agricultural, residential, industrial, or recreational.
Empty samples: At least one soil sample must be provided.
usage: Provide soil sample data including heavy metal concentrations, pH, and sampling parameters to assess contamination levels and risks.

contamination_status.description: Overall contamination status (clean, moderate, high, severe)

risk_assessment.description: Risk level for intended land use

bioavailability_risk.description: Risk of metal bioavailability (low, medium, high)
